attributes.action: MAKE CANNIBALISM ILLEGAL IN THE U.K. SO THAT NO HUMAN MEAT IS IMPORTED TO THE UK
attributes.additional_details: Because they are the only ones that can make the law in this country and right now it is not safe to internationally trade meat with other country’s as most countries in the world have not made cannibalism illegal!
attributes.background: Make cannibalism illegal so that it is safer to trade with other countries in meat industries.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. It's already illegal to import or sell meat unfit for human consumption.
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do, such as creating a specific criminal offence.
